explanation: [0-0] In a carpeted room, a family is sitting on the floor. On the left, a man in a red short-sleeved shirt is looking at his phone with both hands. To his right sits a man in a gray and white striped short-sleeved shirt, looking down at a book. To the right of the man in the striped shirt sits a boy in a white vest, also looking down at a book. There are three white plates in front of them. On the right, a woman wearing a black headscarf sits with a bucket of cooking oil in front of her. To her left is a blue-flowered blanket on a white background, with pancakes on it. In the background, there is a closed wooden door and several cushions. The walls of the room are white.
